title: DJ sona's music sharing button missing
body:
In DJ Sona's reveal it was shown that her team could tune in to her music by pressing a button next to her portrait, but its isn't there
is this a bug or was this feature removed or is there another way to access the music?

replies.body: You need to bring up the scoreboard with the Tab key first.

Can you screenshot it?

I can't find it
I'm pretty sure you have to hold tab
Same issue on my end too.  Was wondering what happened to it.
